statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, total_spent FROM user_profiles WHERE total_purchases > 10 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT username, total_purchases FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email, last_login FROM user_profiles WHERE total_spent < 1000 AND total_purchases BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY last_login ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30;
SELECT username, email, gender, total_purchases FROM user_profiles WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, total_spent FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT user_id, email, total_purchases, total_spent FROM user_profiles WHERE total_purchases > 5 AND (gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female') ORDER BY total_spent DESC, total_purchases ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_name FROM purchase_history WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT user_id, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM purchase_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles JOIN purchase_history ON user_profiles.user_id = purchase_history.user_id WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, full_name, address FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchase_history WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY date_of_purchase DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_id, recommended_product, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, r.recommended_product, r.recommendation_score FROM purchase_history p JOIN recommendations r ON p.user_id = r.user_id WHERE p.price > 100 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT u.full_name, p.product_name, p.date_of_purchase FROM user_profiles u JOIN purchase_history p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY p.date_of_purchase ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, join_date FROM users ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT address_id, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state='CA';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price <= 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE users.age > 30
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' OR manufacturer = 'Samsung'
SELECT u.username, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, category, preference_level FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, u.first_name, u.last_name FROM product_catalog p INNER JOIN user_profiles u ON p.product_id = u.user_id;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, AVG(r.recommendation_score) AS avg_score FROM user_profiles u LEFT JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
